model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    this is a player class which contains the players attributes and basic setter getter functions to get and set the value out of it. Some business logic is also added in this class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
